Title: Blessed are the Righteous

Verses.1:
Blessed is the one who fears the LORD, [*]
	who greatly delights in His commandments.
Verses.2:
Their descendants will be mighty on the earth, [*]
	the generation of the upright will be blessed.
Verses.3:
In their houses are abundant riches, [*]
	and their righteousness endures forever.
Verses.4:
In the darkness a light shines for the upright, [*]
	He is gracious, compassionate, and righteous.
Verses.5:
A good person is gracious and lends, [t]
	they conduct their affairs justly, [*]
Verses.6:
and they will never be shaken.

The righteous will be remembered forever, [*]
Verses.7:
they will not fear evil news.
Their hearts are steadfast, trusting in the LORD, [t]
Verses.8:
their hearts are strong, they won't be afraid, [*]
	they will look with triumph over their foes.
Verses.9:
He has distributed freely, and given to the poor; [t]
	His justice endures forever, [*]
	His horn will be exalted with honor.
Verses.10:
The wicked will see and be furious, [t]
	they will gnash their teeth and melt away. [*]
	The desire of the wicked leads to destruction.
